ModMetaData.name: Zombie Blight
ModMetaData.author: Your Name
ModMetaData.description:
A zombie infection mod that introduces the Blight - a dangerous infection that can turn creatures into zombies.
Features: - Infection mechanics - Dynamic zombie generator - Special resources extracted from zombies - Crafting system for resistance additives and treatment serums to protect colonists from infection - Compatible with other race and animal mods Note:Infected corpse don't become shamblers.
